page.title: 02A Day in Sarah Cobbe's Life
page.content: The best day of the week is Thursday.I get up on a Thursday, or any morning about a quarter to eight. The first thing I do is get a wash, and get dressed. When I'm dressed I start to play. My mum calls me then{"Sarah"}she always shouts,{"come for your {breakfast it is ready." "Coming",}I say. By this time my sister Joanne gets up ready for Play-school, she is only four. I then go down for my breakfast. I always have 1 big slice of toast and a drink of tea.It's about a quarter past eight.My dad then says goodbye and goes to work , he is a mechanic. My mum cleans.I now brush my hair and now I go to school with my sandwiches and my swimming gear. I go and call for Keith and Michael.I then walk to School.Mrs.Siddall,the crossing lady,crosses us over the main road.When I get to School,I have to
